wikipedia_page.main: Christian David Loader (Born 26 October 1973) is a former Welsh rugby union player who played prop. He achieved 19 Wales caps between 1995 and 1997.  Loader played for Pontypridd RFC and Bath Rugby. He retired in 2006.
